entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
